document_data.caption: ''The tiefling lookout Rikka.''
document_data.name: Rikka
document_data.mainbody:
'''Rikka''' was a [[tiefling]] that lived at the [[Emerald Grove]] [[druid]]ic enclave after being exiled along with all the other [[tiefling]]s from [[Elturel]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Glad you were here for those goblins. Picked one off yesterday, myself. Shot her through the throat. That should've killed her, buy...she kept gasping.}}
document_data.Possessions: While guarding the Emerald Grove, Rikka wore a suit of [[scale mail]] armor and armed herself with a [[longbow]].
document_data.History:
After [[the Descent]] of Elturel into [[Avernus]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Rikka and the exiled Elturian tieflings led by [[Zevlor]] traveled west towards the great metropolis of [[Baldur's Gate]]. They were granted temporary refuge at Emerald Grove for some time, due to increased [[goblin]] attacks in the region.

Rikka was forced to kill for the first time defending the grove. Even though she killed a goblin that would likely cause her or her companions harm, Rikka was quite troubled about the whole ordeal.
